watering: Water once every 2-3 weeks. Avoid overwatering.
sunlight: Thrives in low to bright indirect light.
fertilizing: Feed once a month during spring and summer with a balanced houseplant fertilizer.

watering: Keep soil consistently moist but not soggy. Water when top inch is dry.
sunlight: Bright indirect light is ideal; can tolerate low light.
fertilizing: Fertilize every 6-8 weeks with a diluted liquid fertilizer during growing season.

watering: Water every 3 weeks. Allow soil to dry completely between watering.
sunlight: Prefers bright, indirect sunlight or partial shade.
fertilizing: Fertilize sparingly, 2-3 times a year with succulent fertilizer.

watering: Water when top 2 inches of soil are dry.
sunlight: Bright indirect light; avoid direct sun to prevent leaf burn.
fertilizing: Feed monthly with a balanced liquid fertilizer during spring and summer.

watering: Water once a week; allow soil to dry slightly between waterings.
fertilizing: Fertilize every 2-4 weeks during the growing season with a balanced fertilizer.

sunlight: Can tolerate low light, but grows faster in bright indirect light.
fertilizing: Fertilize monthly during growing season with a diluted liquid fertilizer.

watering: Water when the top inch of soil dries out.
sunlight: Bright indirect light is best; can tolerate some direct sun.
fertilizing: Feed every 4-6 weeks in spring and summer with a balanced fertilizer.

watering: Water when soil is dry; avoid waterlogging.
sunlight: Requires bright, direct sunlight for best growth.
fertilizing: Fertilize once a month during spring and summer with cactus or succulent fertilizer.

watering: Water when top 1-2 inches of soil is dry.
sunlight: Thrives in low to bright indirect light.
fertilizing: Fertilize every 2 months with balanced houseplant fertilizer.

watering: Keep soil consistently moist, but not soggy.
sunlight: Bright indirect light; avoid direct sunlight.
fertilizing: Feed every 4-6 weeks during growing season with a balanced liquid fertilizer.
